glossdef.p: A configuration labeled supported can be used in a production setup. ${organization.name} confirms that the software is running with this system configuration without impacting the functions of the software. ${organization.name} verifies this by using the configuration during quality assurance and regression testing of the software. Restrictions and limitations are fully documented to the best knowledge of ${organization.name}. Updates on known restrictions and limitations are actively communicated by ${organization.name}.
